name: Street Soccer - Futsal 2022
description:
The best Street Football Game for 2022 has arrived. Run, Shoot, Compete, Play and WIN..... All the realism and quality of this free soccer simulator game are to be the future stars. Get ready to have some time by playing this football soccer game.


This game is specially designed to give you a touch of what street sports matches feel like. Select a nation you want to compete with and be ready to win. Do not hesitate if you don’t have the skills to play, use training mode to get yourself trained. Polish your champion-level skills and start to play. Take control of your team on the field during league games or tournament games. Starting with a rookie team, you’ll need to improve your players’ abilities to reach the top league and compete against the best teams in the world for the championship and the cup. You will enjoy this ultimate football game.


Play like a PRO on street, and defeat your opponents at the match. There are four game modes:

Training Mode:
Train your team for playing fantastic Soccer matches. Become a PRO by getting trained and get ready to play an actual match.

Friendly Match:
Select your team and play with other teams. Team choice entirely depends on who you want to play with.

Knockout Mode:
Choose your team and beat the other two competing teams to win the knockout round.

Tournament Mode:
Play football with 9 other nations and WIN the tournament by getting maximum points.


It is not like any football game you have played before. Top 20 nations are added to the game, pick the one you want to compete with. Three different stadiums for you to select an environment. Play like a street soccer champion and get your name on the top leaderboard. Realistic graphics and intuitive touch controls make it easy to play the game. This game is specially designed for football fans to be able to play with world champion teams. The game is all about timing, take a strike at the right time to score a goal point. Earn rewards for winning each match.


Get ready to be a part of the bulky sports stadium, and play like you own the game. Invite your friends to play and challenge them on who can score more goals in this street soccer game. Stay updated with your winning score by checking the scoreboard. Dodge your opponents and pass the ball to your teammate during the match so that your team can score a point.


Play against different national teams in street soccer and become a superstar. Give your best flick and show your football moves that will help you last in the game. Work your way through all the matches and who everyone who is a PRO player! With simply designed gameplay and great physics, this soccer game is easy to pick up and fun to play. In true competitive style, challenge your opponents all over the world and start playing. Pick a stadium set of your choice and get ready to flick the ball. Become a football star player by winning all the matches. The cool background will attain your attention till the end. Powerful gameplay and smoother controls will help you get a hold of the game quickly. Do not miss out on this extremely fun sports competition.


Street Soccer - Futsal 202‪2 Features:‬

-Top 20 Soccer playing nations are added.
-Four playing modes that are Training, Friendly, Knockout, and Tournament are added.
-Three different stadiums are added.
-Smoother, realistic, and optimized graphics for both players and perfect stadiums.
-Cool background sound that will keep you engaged with the game.
-Simple yet powerful touch controls with timing control.
-Compete with your friends with the integrated world ranking leader board
